articles.description: Former captain Michael Vaughan says he was “staggered” by England’s decision to field first after India piled on 359-3 on day one of the first Test at Headingley.
articles.title: England v India: Michael Vaughan 'staggered' by Headingley toss decision

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions warm up for their Australian tour in deflating fashion as they fall to a slick and pacey Argentina side in Dublin.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 24-28 Argentina: Andy Farrell's Lions lose pre-tour Dublin fixture to Pumas

articles.description: Liverpool sign Germany playmaker Florian Wirtz from Bayer Leverkusen for a club record £116m.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz transfer: Liverpool sign Bayer Leverkusen midfielder in £116m deal

articles.description: Doubts about India's future after the retirements of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are laid to rest by Shubman Gill and Yashavi Jaiswal's centuries on day one of the first Test against England.
articles.title: England vs India: Shubman Gill and Yashavi Jaiswal show tourists' future safe after Virat Kohli

articles.description: Weather concerns are taking centre stage at the Fifa Club World Cup after a fourth game was delayed - while a heat wave is expected next week.
articles.title: Fifa Club World Cup: Weather raising major concerns in US tournament

articles.description: Former Ajax winger Quincy Promes has been extradited to the Netherlands, where he will serve a seven-and-a-half-year prison sentence for drug trafficking and aggravated assault.
articles.title: Quincy Promes extradited to the Netherlands to serve prison sentence

articles.description: Nicolas Jackson's red card at the Club World Cup has presented new signing Liam Delap with a free run at the starting berth in the Chelsea attack.
articles.title: Chelsea: Nicolas Jackson's 'stupid, stupid, stupid' red card opens door for Liam Delap

articles.description: With Florian Wirtz set to join Liverpool for a club-record £100m, BBC Sport look at where the Germany midfielder will play.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz to Liverpool: Mohamed Salah, Luis Diaz, Dominik Szoboszlai, Darwin Nunez - where will German fit?

articles.description: Juventus eye Manchester United winger Jadon Sancho, Crystal Palace defender Marc Guehi makes Liverpool stance clear, PSG told fee for Illia Zabarnyi by Bournemouth.
articles.title: Football gossip: Sancho, Onana, Isak, Guehi, Gundogan, Zabarnyi, Semenyo, Palhinha

articles.description: Head coach Andy Farrell says the British and Irish Lions must learn "a lot of lessons" from a "disconnected" performance in Friday's 28-24 loss to Argentina in Dublin.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions 24-28 Argentina: Lions must learn from errors, says Andy Farrell
